website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for the ultimate ultracompact point-and-shoot, the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX200V is probably it. Too bad its price tag is ridiculously high.
pros: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX200V is a powerful and relatively fast-performing ultracompact camera capable of taking some high-quality snapshots and movie clips
cons: The TX200V is very expensive and its body collects fingerprints and the door covering its battery and ports seems insubstantial given its waterproofing

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough great things about this camera - beautiful photos (they might need some light editing on the computer), but it beautifully captures a wide range of landscapes, terrains, and subjects (such as people or animals). Great pictures, functions well. I recently used it while snorkeling and we had no problems with waterproofing. The camera has also endured being tossed around a bit on several hiking trips in both Costa Rica and Maui, Hawaii. I highly recommend this camera for colorful shots with outstanding clarity!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent waterproof camera for those of us who like taking reasonably good pictures, but aren't photography experts
customer_reviews.text: Over six months with me this camera was in Nepali rivers, New Jersey beaches, Florida oceans, Tennessee lakes, and in thunderstorms. It has also taken many great pictures while not in water. I treat my equipment kindly and don't drop it, but I am not perfect and the camera has endured a few minor bumps. I didn't reliable electricity to recharge it, but the battery lasts long enough so that if I am conscious of conserving it it will last many days (taking only pictures that I think will be good, and not ever tree that I see). The purchase was absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small camera to keep in my pocket as most of all my other cameras are rather bulky with prices ranging from $5000 to $600 for body only. It is waterproof, easy to use and takes just as good of a picture as my large DSLR camera, sometimes it is not the camera but the photographer! Geat deal mainly because of the price, it was originally $599 but was reduced to $234. There were few sales when it was new because of the price for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't in the market for a new camera, but when my son received his as a gift I just had to have it. It takes beautiful pictures, the touch screen is very easy to use, and I love the effects menu. I do have a bit of a problem with the flash being a bit too strong and washing out faces, but I am sure that I have to adjust a setting somewhere and haven't figured it out yet. The other reviews have mentioned fingerprint problems on the glass, but they don't seem to affect picture quality or ease of use for me.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Curry Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a small camera with very nice picture quality then this is it! Please note that it's the same size as the average canon camera without the zoom. It takes very nice pictures and you don't have to do anything tricky. Just point and shoot and the pictures come out great! All the settings are automatic, you don't have to do squat. If you can afford it, buy it, don't waste money on big expensive cameras that will just give you the same picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thanh Q. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I add an older model that was stolen out of my car that was 16mp that took much better pictures than this camera which is a 18mp. not sure if there is something wrong with the camera as it was used.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Kissell

customer_reviews.title: UNIQUE BUT VERY FRAGILE
customer_reviews.text: PROS: - superb video 1920x1080 60p - good stabilizer - good audio recording - good picture - touchscreen - weather sealed - very tiny camera - sexy and original glass body CONS: - difficult to handle due to its size and touchscreen - extremely fragile due to its glass body - battery compartment not so good underwater - fingerprints all over the body - easy to scratch TIPS: - use it carefully - don't use it underwater - keep it in a hard case mine got the screen broken, even inside a leather case.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Tx200v
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera little slow on picture taking.Thin fit in any pocket. wish the lens had a cover over it when not in use, just clean it for lint or finger marks. price and quality not bad wish it had shock and drop proof. Water proof took it at 6ft and not bad better out side the water and don't have to worrier about weather even better. I would buy this again but to be used on hiking or in bad weather or near water other wise I would use my T2i Camera.
customer_reviews.author: KNN.

customer_reviews.title: Component Broke within 4 months with minimal usage. Bad soldering on board?
customer_reviews.text: After maybe a dozen uses the USB connector pulled the component it inserts into right out of the camera. Can't charge, can't upload pictures. Bad solder? Poor design? I snapped a picture with my iPad but don't see how to upload here to share. I had to buy a micro card reader and battery recharger to get my pictures off of the TX200V. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Design23D

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are very happy with this camera. We tested it along with 4 others and chose this one. It's a great, compact size, fairly large touch screen, we've taken underwater pics with no problem and it has good picture quality. It still won't replace our larger, semi-professional camera, but for a point and shoot on smaller trips, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: C Powell

customer_reviews.title: Good seller bad product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item in the hopes I could use it in generally calm waters consistently to take basic underwater photos. Camera died within a few times of using it. Magically it came back on and used a few more times before it died. I mailed it back to sony who made the determination that it was improperly used even though it's as simple as closing the hatch on the bottom with no debris in the seal. Not only did this happen to me but to another friend with a similar model. Do yourself a favor and buy a camera with a solid housing like a GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary J Akin

customer_reviews.title: Fragile but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with great features. Any weight say from putting in a back pocket and sitting on a padded chair and the touchscreen goes out. Screen still functions but you cant see it therefore making it practically useless. THis is the second one its happened to. Beware its fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Linkdead

customer_reviews.title: T series!
customer_reviews.text: T series, are my favorate, which are also sony's materpieces! They are in great appearance and have high performance. They will never be replaced by smart phone and DRL. I already have some. Tx 200 is also a great one, with water proof, without the slide lid. Only small battery, which does not matter because we can change battery any time.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Chou

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera! Poor protection...
customer_reviews.text: Great specs and features! Love the camera but it NEEDS NEEDS NEEDS a rubber protective case like you can get for a smartphone!!! (Otterbox, can you hear me?) What really sucks is I ordered this camera to take with me in order to journal an epic 2 week motorcross trip across Mongolia and it dropped 2 feet out of an open zipper pocket on my backpack and shattered on the first day there (about 3 days after it arrived) rendering it useless. The good news is that Sony support, after finding that it was unrepairable, offered to replace it at a much reduced cost. I was VERY appreciative of this considering the nearly $500 this phone costs.
customer_reviews.author: Jman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice full featured point & shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has everything I need. It Has a high megapixel rating, 5x optical zoom, loaded with features and is water proof to 16 feet, so you can take it to the pool and not worry too much if it gets wet. I got the camera pretty quick, too in good packaging. Look forward to using this camera on my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Shkwata

customer_reviews.title: Small but takes really good pictures. No need to worry about dust or ...
customer_reviews.text: Small but takes really good pictures. No need to worry about dust or water. Put a 64Gb SD card so you do have to change cards in a bad place
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Day

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Camera, but it is overpriced at this current moment in time
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is wonderful. A nice sleek touch screen camera with high megapixels and good photos and movies, but it should be a few hundred dollars less in price. until this camera is 300 i cannot recommend it to anyone, but once the price drops over time, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Fun camera for slipping into your pocket. Takes great photos, but zoom is really weak! Used it underwater a few times and that was fun.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lockrey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It takes awesome pictures. I wanted to take a group picture against the setting sun, and the picture came out bright and clear with everyone's faces visible without flash. I have yet to try the waterproof feature, but so far I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Handy and High Tech Little Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Pictures are extremely high quality and the features provide the ability to make some rich photography.
customer_reviews.author: David Roach

customer_reviews.title: The second this thing touched water it went completely out.
customer_reviews.text: I ensured that the battery housing was sealed before it was submerged. Completely dead now. $400 bucks wasted and no pictures of my vacation. Farts.
customer_reviews.author: Krut

customer_reviews.title: Stellar
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. The waterproof and shock proof feature is great. I love the fully in closed design. Now I don't have to worry about urine or beer shutting my good time down.
customer_reviews.author: Klaus Hunter

customer_reviews.title: great cam
customer_reviews.text: great cam of high quality material, nice design, new model. product brand name is famous n reliable. recommended, for good price, have all new features for best cam ;o))
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Daher

customer_reviews.title: BY FAR, BEST CAMERA I EVER OWNED!
customer_reviews.text: BY FAR, BEST CAMERA I EVER OWNED! I love freaking ppl out by throwing it in the pool at BBQs
customer_reviews.author: MPG

customer_reviews.title: Cant be better!
customer_reviews.text: We love this camera! Easy to use and very nice pictures! I havent have any complaints about it and good thing is from my favorite electronic brand! Cant go wrong with "SONY"
customer_reviews.author: Thomas!!!!

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the camera is great, the pictures and video look amazing
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the camera is great, the pictures and video look amazing! however is not efficiently waterproof as is marketed,
customer_reviews.author: Ayron Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: light, fast, good image quality! very well built, makes much more happier than the old fuji that I got. very easy to use, good on low light too.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L

customer_reviews.title: Best little point and shoot I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This is the highest quality HD point and shoot I've ever had. The best part about it is that it's fully water proof and it doesn't look it at all! Great job Sony!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Chung

customer_reviews.title: Great pics even in the water!
customer_reviews.text: Camera takes awesome pictures and at 18.2 pixels the image is sharp when enlarged. A must for the photographer who likes to get some underwater shots!
customer_reviews.author: Lou B

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera.
customer_reviews.text: Works great even underwater. films with excellent quality and also takes photos while shooting, but the quality of these pictures is only good during the day. recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: glaydson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for! The manual says that it is water proof but i do not think I will take it when I am diving.
customer_reviews.author: Robob

customer_reviews.title: Does not work underwater!
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes great pictures and is quite easy to use - just like a cell phone camera. BUT..... one would think for an underwater camera, that the controls could be used while... UNDERWATER? Nope! The touchscreen is completely functionless while wet, nt registering any capacitive finger presses or pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT DROP ONTO CONCRETE a few times... Otherwise A Nice Camera.
customer_reviews.text: It WORKED Great... until, I dropped it once too many times onto concrete... It made sharp and clear pictures. VERY light weight..
customer_reviews.author: Patented American Inventor Jack Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Shock proof
customer_reviews.text: Survived a 40' fall from the top of a castle wall in Lisbon and lived to take over 400 more photos. Not waterproof anymore, but still working like a jewel.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Blanks

customer_reviews.title: A nice piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a lot of nice features but it's unable to take good photos or videos. If you take a picture with flash, is very likely that you're going to get a blue flare in the upper right corner and white faces. It's a battery sucker! Don't waste your money buying this camera, the older models like TX10 or TX20 are way better (and cheaper).
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Best little camera
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Little cameras there was on the market. Shame it's not produced any more. Only drawback ist the soft Screen which scratches easily
customer_reviews.author: Georges  Gretener

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera was all that i expected it to be love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne vlack

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the camera works well. High quality. But the pictures are misleading. Its a very thick pocket camera. About double the sizes of an Android or Iphone. I returned it for the T-66, which is extremely thin, and has all the same features, except waterproofing and gps, two items i would never use. So beware of misleading thin pictures and look at the T-66 instead.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible camera, gorilla glass in the front creates glares in pictures and all kinds of problems, since it messes up lighting, stay away from it, DSC-TX10 takes much better pictures.
customer_reviews.author: RONALD MADRIGAL A

customer_reviews.title: Excelente
customer_reviews.text: Maquina bonita e funcional, vale a pena cada centavo gasto. Também tira foto 3D, ainda não vi o resultado na TV por falta de tempo...
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Fernando Conceição de Araujo

customer_reviews.title: My Last Sony Camera
customer_reviews.text: The DSC-TX200V takes okay pictures. However, when I was using the camera in southeast asia, the GPS feature only worked 10-20% of the time even though I was taking the pictures outdoor. Sony should disclose the accuracy of its GPS function! If I had known that the GPS function works only occasionally, I would have purchased a less expensive camera.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Mar

customer_reviews.title: Does not use standard SD cards
customer_reviews.text: I just received this camera today. It has impressive specs and I can't wait to use it but it came with a significant disappointment that isn't listed in the information about the camera. It DOES NOT use standard SD cards. It requires a micro SD card. That means it won't work with my Eye-Fi cards so I lose the convenience of automatic Wi-Fi uploading. It also means I have to go buy a micro SD card before I can try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Had about 9 months now and this is my 3rd waterproof camera. Works well, take great picture, movies are good and sound is good. That's all I want from my cameras beside rugged and small.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX200V 18.2 MP Waterproof Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 3.3-inch OLED (Silver) (2012 Model)
product_meta.description:
Color:SilverFROM THE MANUFACTURER






SONY CYBER-SHOT DSC-TX200V 18.2 MP DIGITAL CAMERA WITH 5X OPTICAL ZOOM AND 3.3-INCH OLED 







 * Capture 18.2MP ultra-high definition images even in low-light
   
 * Certified waterproof and dustproof
 * Sleek glass design plus a large 3.3-inch OLED
 * Hi-speed AF improves focus speed, even in low light
   
 * Full HD 1080/60p with dual record of stills and movies
   
 * Clear Image Zoom captures realistic detailed images
 * Capture the decisive moment with up to 10fps
   
 * Optical SteadyShot with Active Mode for blur-free movies 
   
 * Picture Effect for more expressive photos
 *  Photo Creativity allows exposure setting adjustment
   













































Experience the stylish glass design of the Sony DSC-TX200V. The waterproof and dustproof camera features a 3.3-inch OLED touch screen, an 18.2MP sensor, an ultra-stable 5X optical/10X Clear Image Zoom, and Hi-speed AF. The DSC-TX200V also captures incredible low light pictures at up to 10fps, and Full HD 1080/60p video. 




KEY FEATURES
18.2 MEGAPIXEL BACK-ILLUMINATED EXMOR R CMOS IMAGE SENSOR
The 18.2MP Exmor R CMOS sensor captures ultra-high definition images that take full advantage of the camera’s sharp Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens. The sensor enables advanced processing that reduces noise levels up to 6 times more than other sensors, resulting in stunning low light images with incredible details.


WATERPROOF AND DUSTPROOF

The sleek and stylish DSC-TX200V fits the slimmest pocket or purse. Thanks to its airtight construction, it is dustproof as well as waterproof to a depth of 16 feet.

SLIM GLASS DESIGN PLUS A 3.3-INCH OLED
The DSC-TX200V features a sleek, polished glass camera front without protruding lenses or control buttons, making it one of the thinnest cameras in its class, and adding to its water- and dust-proof design. The 5X optical zoom extends internally, and scenes can be composed or played back on the camera’s bright and colorful 3.3-inch OLED monitor.

HI-SPEED AF

To improve focusing speed and sensitivity, the Exmor R CMOS sensor uses its rapid 240fps throughput to deliver high-quality image signals to the camera’s BIONZ processor, which provides intelligent response data to a new high speed actuator motor in the lens. The result is fast, DSLR-like focusing speeds even in low light. 
FULL HD 1080/60P

Record crystal clear movies at the highest resolution available with capabilities for 60p in 1080. This provides stunning, fast motion video with less distortion for playback on your HD TV. With dual record of stills and movies, you can shoot both at the same time.

OPTICAL ZOOM PLUS CLEAR IMAGE ZOOM

Most digital zooms use electronic cropping to get closer to the subject, resulting in unsharp images. With Clear Image Zoom the powerful processor compares patterns found in adjacent pixels and creates new pixels to match selected patterns, resulting in more realistic, higher-quality images. Clear Image Zoom doubles optical zoom for closer photos.

CAPTURE THE DECISIVE MOMENT WITH UP TO 10FPS

Capture full 18.2 megapixel resolution images at up to 10 frames per second, helping to ensure that the decisive moment is captured such as the soccer ball flying into the goal. In addition, a mechanical shutter helps reduce distortion when continuously shooting moving subjects.

OPTICAL STEADYSHOT WITH ACTIVE MODE

Optical SteadyShot with Active Mode for blur-free movies even while walking. Camera-shake compensation using Optical SteadyShot/Active Mode has been improved with the addition of new electronic image stabilization. Now it’s easier than ever to obtain sharp, blur-free movies even when zooming in unsteady situations, such as shooting with one hand while walking.

PICTURE EFFECT FOR MORE EXPRESSIVE PHOTOS 

Picture Effect adds a new level of expression to photos, making ordinary landscapes and portraits come to life by heightening mood and emphasizing certain attributes. Select camera models have up to nine different effects. 

PHOTO CREATIVITY

Photo Creativity allows you to fine-tune your exposure settings, such as brightness, color, and vividness, and quickly choose the right enhancement for your subject. Now you can view Picture Effects and Photo Creativity effects in real time on the camera’s monitor or in the viewfinder before shooting. 

BACKGROUND DEFOCUS

DSLR photographs are often beautiful because they blur the background, putting the emphasis on the subject. Now our point-and-shoot cameras can deliver this signature DSLR benefit. The system takes two shots, identifies the background and applies a defocused background keeping the subject crisp and clear.


SUPERIOR AUTO MODE


Get cleaner, more dynamic pictures and fewer missed shots. The DSC-TX200V automatically recognizes the correct scene mode, then quickly shoots and combines up to six shots to produce images with greater clarity, optimum dynamic range using backlight correction HDR technology and lower image noise using 6 shots layering technology. Superior Auto intelligently detects 33 scenes for still images and movies, making it easy to get the best shot.


FACE DETECTION TECHNOLOGY


Face Detection technology detects up to eight individual faces and adjusts focus, exposure, and white balance to help deliver crisp, properly lit images of family and friends.



SMILE SHUTTER TECHNOLOGY 


Smile Shutter technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter button and the camera does the rest. You can also select adult and child priority and indicate the degree of Smile Detection sensitivity. Intelligent Scene Recognition can now be used together with Smile Shutter mode when the Intelligent Auto mode is on. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting. 

ANTI-BLINK FUNCTION 

It’s frustrating to capture the perfect shot, only to review it later and discover subjects blinked during the photo. The Anti-blink function works to help counter blinking and squinting. When the camera is set to Soft Snap, the Anti-blink function captures two images, recording only the photo with less squinting. If a blink is detected in other shooting modes, a warning will be displayed after you take the shot.

SOFT SKIN MODE

Portrait subjects will love the results. Soft Skin mode recognizes skin tones and reduces the appearance of blemishes and wrinkles without affecting the rest of the shot.

INTELLIGENT SCENE RECOGNITION (ISCN) MODE

Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode automatically detects 33 different types of scenes and, within just 1/30th of a second, selects the appropriate camera settings. iSCN has two modes: Auto and Advanced. In Auto Mode, the camera takes a single shot using the optimal settings. In Advanced Mode, the camera takes a photo with the optimal settings and, if in difficult lighting (low light or back light) immediately takes a second photo with another optimized setting so you can choose which to keep.

NATURAL FLASH

Conventional point-and-shoot camera flash shots just don't capture colors the way the eye sees them. Natural Flash mode takes a reference shot without flash and then uses that reference to correct the color, for far more lifelike images.

MOTION DETECTION

Motion Detection, along with Face Motion Detection adjusts ISO sensitivity and increases the shutter speed when movement is detected, reducing blur in moving subjects and faces.


1. Records in 29 minute segments 
2. Requires HDTV and HDMI cable sold separately
feature_bullets: Optical SteadyShot with Active Mode for blur-free movies

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars75 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
